original_text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence am base among you, but being absent am bold toward you:
korean_text: 너희를 대면하면 유순하고 떠나 있으면 너희에 대하여 담대한 나 바울은 이제 그리스도의 온유와 관용으로 친히 너희를 권하고

sentences.original_text: Now I Paul myself beseech you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 나 바울 자체가 너희에게 간청하노니

sentences.original_text: by the meekness and gentleness of Christ
who in presence am base among you
but being absent am bold toward you
sentences.korean_translation: 떠나 있을 때는 너희를 향해 담대하다
